story.storykicker: The hall tickets for the Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2016 have been released. The exam is scheduled to be conducted on June 11 and 12 by Anna University, Chennai on behalf of the Government of Tamil Nadu.
story.storybody:
The hall tickets for the Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2016, have been released. All those candidates, who have registered for the exam, can download the same from its official website www.annauniv.edu. This exam is conducted for the candidates who seek admissions in programmes -- MBA, MCA, ME/M.Tech/M.Arch/M.Plan.

The exam is scheduled to be conducted on June 11 and 12 by Anna University, Chennai on behalf of the Government of Tamil Nadu.

Steps to download the hall ticket:

  • Log on to the official website, www.annauniv.edu
  • Click on 'Download hall ticket'
  • On the next page, enter your user ID and password
  • Click on login
  • Your hall ticket will be displayed on the screen
  • Download the same and take a print out for future reference.

Those candidates who have lost their TANCET 2016 hall ticket can obtain a duplicate copy on payment of Rs 100, through a DD obtained from any nationalised bank drawn in favour of 'The Secretary, TANCET, Anna University, Chennai', payable at Chennai.

(Read: ATMA July 2016: Check out the exam dates and structure)

Paper pattern

For MBA programme:

The question paper will have various sections to evaluate different skills of the candidates, such as: the candidate's ability to recognise the data critically

For MCA programmes:

The exam will be based on quantitative ability, analytical reasoning, logical reasoning and computer awareness. A few questions may also be on verbal activity, basic science, etc.

For ME/MTech/MArch/MPlan programmes:

The questions will be set at undergraduate level, and the exam will be held for a duration of two hours.

Important dates

TANCET for MBA/MCA programmes will be conducted on June 11.

TANCET for ME/MTech/MArch/MPlan programmes will be conducted on June 12.

Read: UPPSC UPPCS Pre Exam 2016: Check out the marksheet at uppsc.up.nic.in

For information on more upcoming exams and notifications, click here.
